title: Dispute a Vendor Invoice
description: The accounting department notices they were overcharged on an invoice from a food supplier.

tasks.description: Compare the invoice charges to the original purchase order and the agreed-upon contract pricing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds that the price for produce is higher than the contract rate.

tasks.description: Contact the vendor to report the discrepancy and request a corrected invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent communicates the issue to the vendor.

tasks.description: Place a hold on the incorrect invoice in the accounting system until a credit memo or new invoice is received.
tasks.expected_outcome: The invoice is put on hold to prevent accidental payment.
